name: P14
prompt: Security camera footage from elevated doorbell camera, suburban home front porch at dusk. Fading natural light mixed with activated porch lights, long shadows. A person in dark hoodie with hood pulled up, face obscured by hood, average build, moving with deliberate slow pace. They leave the front door area and walk along the house toward the side yard. Fixed camera position, wide-angle lens with slight barrel distortion, fisheye edge distortion, Transitional lighting quality, warm tones, automatic exposure adjusting. Realistic human motion, 18-second duration.
